page.title: 11Education.
page.content: Within a few miles of our school, Broadbent Fold C.P, there are examples of the variety of schools provided by Tameside Education Authority. Dukinfield High School, which has been a comprehensive school for only 4/5 years, is the only Senior School in the immediate area. It is on two sites, and has over 900 pupils. Next door is Yew Tree Community school, which not only provides community activities in after-school hours, but also houses a Nursery and an E.S.N. Unit. Just round the corner is St. Mary's Primary school, which is Roman Catholic, and gives preference to children from Catholic homes. (Their Senior School, All Saints, is just outside our area.) Our own school serves a private housing estate, high on Hough Hill, with tremendous views over the whole of Manchester.
